page.title: 14After School Hours.
page.content: In Heald Green there are several activities that children can take part in after school hours. For the girls aged 7 to 10 there is the Brownies. They wear a uniform of a brown dress and yellow tie. For older girls, up to 15 there is Guides. The Guides wear a blue uniform and often go camping. Young boy can join the Cubs and at all transfer to the Scouts. There are 3 Scout troops in Heald Green which do many outdoor activities. Some boys join the Boys Brigade at St.Columba's. They play football and have a blue uniform. They meet every friday. The Library has a club where people can win awards for reading books. There is a youth club that meets once a week for teenagers, and some of the churches have their own youth club.
